pages.text: How to write music to a $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_tape)Cassette Tape$(/l) using a $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_deck)Cassette Deck$(/l).$(br)If you have a $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/parabolic_antenna)Parabolic Antenna$(/l), this step is not necessary.

pages.title: Start writing
pages.text: First, prepare a $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_tape)Cassette Tape$(/l), select the music you want to write from [Write], and press the start icon.
